title: Gunmen attack Syrian border guards, killing 6
description: DAMASCUS， May 14 (Xinhua) -- An armed group attacked Syrian border guards' post at a suburb of the capital Damascus， killing six troops， including an officer， pro-government Sham FM reported.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, May 14 (Xinhua) -- An armed group attacked Syrian border guards' post at a suburb of the capital Damascus, killing six troops, including an officer, pro-government Sham FM reported.The details surrounding the attack are still forthcoming, but the report said many of the assailants were killed in the attack that took place at Damascus' suburb of Rankous.Earlier in the day, armed groups killed two officers in Damascus and southern province of Daraa.Also, local media reported that clashes erupted in the central town of Rastan, with armed men taking over a security detachment. There are reports of casualties among security forces.Violence has continued unabated despite the presence of UN observers, who were reinforced with six new ones from China on Monday.																																																																								|  |
